titleStmt.title: The first part of Parismus, the renovvmed Prince of Bohemia His most famous, delectable, and pleasant historie. Containing his noble battails fought against the Persians. His loue to Laurana, the Kings daughter of Thessalie: and of his strange aduentures in the desolate iland.
Most famous, delectable, and pleasant history of Parismus, the renowned Prince of Bohemia
titleStmt.author: Ford, Emanuel.

notesStmt.note: Another edition of both parts with separate dated title pages and separate register. Part 2 title page reads: The second part of the most famous delectable, and pleasant hystorie of Parismus, the renowmed prince of Bohemia.
Signatures: A-P (-A1, P8, blank?) A-Q R⁴ (-A1, blank?).
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
